_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Server ACZ 8
author: avesmaximus@gmail.com
description: Space Station 14 tells the story of an ordinary shift on a space station gone wrong. Immerse yourself into your role, tinker with detailed systems, and survive the chaos in this round-based multiplayer role playing game.
startup: export DOTNET_TieredPGO=1; export DOTNET_TC_QuickJitForLoops=1; export DOTNET_ReadyToRun=0; export ROBUST_NUMERICS_AVX=true; ./serverfiles/Robust.Server --config-file datadir/server_config.toml --data-dir datadir/

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt -y install curl unzip git python3 git 

ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "linux-x64" || echo "linux-x64")

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

rm serverfiles -r
git clone -b ${BRANCH} ${GAME_REPO} repo && echo "---cloned---"
echo "---going into directory---"
mkdir datadir
mkdir serverfiles
cd repo/
echo "---downloading engine---"
python3 RUN_THIS.py
echo "---building repo---"
dotnet build Content.Packaging --configuration Release
#dotnet build Content.Server --configuration Release
echo "---building package---"
dotnet run --project Content.Packaging server --hybrid-acz --platform linux-x64
echo "---building extracting server files---"
unzip release/SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip -d /mnt/server/serverfiles
#echo "---copying build---"
#cp bin/Content.Server/* /mnt/server/serverfiles
cd ../
echo "---removing repo---"
rm repo/ -r
if [ ! -f datadir/server_config.toml ]; then
    curl http://168.119.12.160:4003/raw/vihiyiwele.makefile --output datadir/server_config.toml
    echo "---no config file found, downloading template---"
fi
chmod 755 serverfiles/Robust.Server


## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Server tickrate
variables.description: The tickrate of the server. Default is 30

variables.description: List server on public server list

variables.description: adds discord to the server infolink

variables.name: default admin user
variables.description: username put in here gets admin on the server

variables.name: server description
variables.description: adds description to the server browser

variables.name: hub urls
variables.description: Comma seperated addresses for the hubs you want to list on.

variables.name: Github branch
variables.description: this is the branch the build will pull from
